thread.title: Barclays reports rise in full-year profits - BBC News
thread.title_full: Barclays reports rise in full-year profits - BBC News

title: Barclays reports rise in full-year profits - BBC News
text:
Image copyright Getty Images Barclays has reported a rise in profits after making "strong progress" in restructuring. 
The bank reported a profit before tax of £3.2bn for 2016, up from £1.1bn the year before. 
Its reorganisation has included the sale of its Africa business. 
Barclays has also been selling off other parts of the business which the bank deems "non-core". Related Topics
